title: Stepping Razor: Red X
occurrences: From 1983 to 1987, Peter Tosh recorded the Red X Tapes.
These tapes were to form the basis for an autobiography called Red X.
He saw a red cross on every official document with his name on it.
The tapes were uncovered in July 1990. These are the actual Red X tapes.
He smoked it until his eyes were as red as fire.
And him smoke until his eyes become as red as a flaming fire.
Seen. Even though his eyes be so red, from his mouth come the words of wisdom, that will be so uplifting.
